title: The Interview
description: Grace Forrester was all dressed up, prim and proper, in her corporate business suit when she arrived for the interview. It was a dream job as an executive assistant to the CEO of one of the most renowned architectural firms in The States.Grace always believed men like Ralph White only existed in the movies and never expected to be told to strip the moment she arrived. To her shock, she immediately obeyed.Ralph White was a formidable man, a billionaire and on the lookout for a new ‘girlfriend’. One that would fit his own particular needs in every way. When Grace walked through his door, he was immediately hooked.The Interview is the prequal to the exciting journey of this couple in the Grace's Initiation series.
author: Linzi Basset
